mapper.select: SELECT F.USER_NO, M.USER_NAME, MP.STATUS_MESSAGE, I.CHANGE_NAME, C.CLASS_NAME, MYCJ.CLASS_NO, FRCJ.USER_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_JOIN CJ WHERE MYCJ.CLASS_NO = CJ.CLASS_NO AND FRCJ.USER_NO = CJ.USER_NO) CNT FROM FRIEND F LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = F.FRIEND_USER_NO LEFT JOIN MYPAGE MP ON MP.USER_NO = F.FRIEND_USER_NO LEFT JOIN MYPAGE_IMG MI ON MP.MYPAGE_NO = MI.MYPAGE_NO AND TYPE='profile' LEFT JOIN IMAGE I USING(IMG_NO) LEFT JOIN CLASS_JOIN FRCJ ON FRCJ.USER_NO = F.FRIEND_USER_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON FRCJ.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_JOIN MYCJ ON MYCJ.USER_NO = F.USER_NO WHERE F.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND F.RESPONSE_STATUS = '수락'
